name: SNES Crossing
description:
Entry for the 2021 Retro Game Jam 

*Refresh the page if it's not loading right away

Thanks to the other developers-

Josh - Graphics

Music - FranciosBL

Music - Rosco

Nom Took has monopolized all the honey on an island home to many honey bears. Can you save the population of bumble bees before it's too late? Or will greed take over and find yourself profiting on this new lucrative business scheme?

The more flowers you plant, the faster the bee population will grow! The larger the bee population, the faster your flowers will grow! 

WASD or Arrow Keyss to move, Enter to talk, Q to toggle inventory, WASD or Arrow Keys to navigate inventory, Enter to select inventory item, Space Bar to pick up items
